title: Need Help Choosing Electives !
content:
It's that time of the year where we (4^(th) SEM completed) are asked to choose an elective course from the elective groups I and II . The image attached gives a list of courses in each group . 

I wanted to know how these courses and are , and your (senior's) recommendation based on overall difficulty , industry relevance , learning curve etc .   
I know the decision is to be primarily made based on my interests , but i'm open to choosing one  based on strong VALID recommendations .
